title: Sorry
lyrics:
Useon mianhae naega
Geuligo mianhago tto mianhae
Modu nae jalmos-ijanh-a
Da nae tas-ijanh-a
Jonjaehaji mal-ass-eoya haessjanh-a
Hey jeongmal mianhae

Kulhan ge naneun an dwae

Babo gat-eun nae seong-gyeogdo

Eomma appaga jusin sojunghan DNA

Nado byeonsinhago sip-eunde

Jeogi TV sog-ui baeyeogdeulcheoleom

Geoul ap-e yeonseubhaedo maeil

Haengboghan cheoghaneun yeongineun eoseolpeo



Apaseo mianhae

Seulpeoseo mianhae

Gamjeong-eul neukkil su issneun

Salam-ieoseo

Yaghaeppajin nayeoseo

Jeongmal neomu mianhae



Jeil sseul de eobsneun ge

Na gat-eun ae geogjeong-ilamae

Geunde neon wae geuleohge maeil

Sseul de eobsneun jis-eul hae

Nega mwol al-eo

Naega neukkineun gotong-ui

1/10ilado ihaehal su iss-eo?

A, majda ileon maldo

Hamyeon an doeneunde mianhae

Please don't be mad

Naega deo josimhaebolge

Nado moleuge..

Nan loboteucheoleom

Gamjeong-eul pyochulhaeseon an doeneun

Gigyende nolaehaneun gigyende

Jeongmal mianhae



Apaseo mianhae

Seulpeoseo mianhae

Gamjeong-eul neukkil su issneun

Salam-ieoseo

Yaghaeppajin nayeoseo

Jeongmal neomu mianhae



Mianhae

Gigyende

Mianhae

Nolaehaneun gigyende nan

Mianhae

Mianhae

Mianhae

Jeongmal mianhae

Mianhae

Nunchido eobs-i naega tto

Sesang-e juje paagdo

Mos hago apahago

Sorry



Apaseo mianhae

Seulpeoseo mianhae

Gamjeong-eul neukkil su issneun

Salam-ieoseo

Yaghaeppajin nayeoseo

Jeongmal neomu mianhae
